name: lga_vic_crime_statistics_2012_2016
title: LGA Number of Offences in Victoria by Offence Type 2012 - 2016

legal.licenceType: Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Australia (CC BY 3.0 AU)

abstract:
This dataset describes crime reported to, or detected by, Victoria Police from October 2011 to September 2016, with a focus on the 12 months from 1 October 2015 to 30 September 2016. Quarterly crime statistics produced by the CSA are based on a rolling 12 month set of statistics that collate four quarters of data. As such, three quarters from the previous reference period are carried forward into the next 12 month period, with the addition of the most recent quarter. This means that changes that may occur within one quarter will be included in four different crime statistics releases. Data was extracted from the Victoria Police Law Enforcement Assistance Program (LEAP) database on 18 October 2016.
The dataset represents all offences recorded in the Victoria Police Law Enforcement Assistance Program (LEAP) database between October 2011 and September 2016, where Victoria Police have recorded a crime prohibited by criminal law. These offences include crimes that have been reported to police as well as those identified by police.For the purposes of reporting, each specific offence belongs to a broader offence category which is used to describe and summarise each offence type. For more information: https://www.crimestatistics.vic.gov.au/about-the-data/classifications

selectedAttributes.name: lga_code_2011
selectedAttributes.title: LGA Code 2011
selectedAttributes.description: Local Government Area (LGA) code, 2011

selectedAttributes.name: a10
selectedAttributes.title: A10 Homicide and related offence
selectedAttributes.description: A10 Homicide and related offence count. Unlawfully kill, attempt or conspire to unlawfully kill, or kill another person as a result of culpable, reckless or negligent act. Includes: murder, attempted murder, accessory or conspiracy to murder, manslaughter and driving causing death.

selectedAttributes.name: a20
selectedAttributes.title: A20 Assault and related offences
selectedAttributes.description: A20 Assault and related offence count. The direct and confrontational infliction of force, injury or violence upon a person or a group of people. Includes: serious assault, assault police, emergency services or other authorised officer and common assault.

selectedAttributes.name: a30
selectedAttributes.title: A30 Sexual offences
selectedAttributes.description: A30 Sexual offences count. Acts, or intent of acts, of a sexual nature against another person, which are non-consensual or where consent is proscribed (for example, the person is legally deemed incapable of giving consent because of youth or temporary/permanent incapacity). Includes: rape, indecent assault, incest, sexual offences against children and other sexual offences.

selectedAttributes.name: a40
selectedAttributes.title: A40 Abduction and related offences
selectedAttributes.description: A40 Abduction and related offence count. Acts that unlawfully deprive another person of their freedom of movement, that are against that person's will or against the will of any parent, guardian or other person having lawful custody or care of that person. Includes: abduction, false imprisonment, slavery and sexual servitude offences.

selectedAttributes.name: a50
selectedAttributes.title: A50 Robbery
selectedAttributes.description: A50 Robbery offence count. The unlawful taking of property, with intent to permanently deprive the owner of the property, from the immediate possession, control, custody or care of a person, accompanied by the use, or threatened use, of immediate force or violence. Includes: aggravated robbery and non-aggravated robbery.

selectedAttributes.name: a60
selectedAttributes.title: A60 Blackmail and extortion
selectedAttributes.description: A60 Blackmail and extortion offence count. The unlawful demanding of money, property, or any other benefit from another person, accompanied by the threat of coercive measures if the demand is not met. Coercive measures may include divulging information about a person, or the use, or threatened use of force or violence if the demand is not met. Includes: blackmail and extortion.

selectedAttributes.name: a70
selectedAttributes.title: A70 Stalking, harassment and threatening behaviour
selectedAttributes.description: A70 Stalking, harassment and threatening behaviour offence count. Acts intended to cause physical or mental harm, or arouse apprehension or fear through a repeated course of unreasonable conduct. This includes actions that are intended to harass, threaten or invade the privacy of an individual. Includes: stalking, harassment and private nuisance, and threatening behaviour.

selectedAttributes.name: a80
selectedAttributes.title: A80 Dangerous and negligent acts endangering people
selectedAttributes.description: A80 Dangerous and negligent acts endangering people offence count. Dangerous or negligent acts which, though not intended to cause harm, actually or potentially result in injury to oneself or another person. Includes: dangerous driving, neglect or ill treatment of people, throw or discharge object endangering people and other dangerous or negligent acts endangering people.

selectedAttributes.name: a_total
selectedAttributes.title: Total offence count: (A)
selectedAttributes.description: Total offence count: (A) Against the person.

selectedAttributes.name: b10
selectedAttributes.title: B10 Arson
selectedAttributes.description: B10 Arson offence count. Intentionally and without lawful excuse destroying or damaging property by fire and intentionally or recklessly causing a bushfire. Includes: cause damage by fire, cause a bushfire and other fire related offences.

selectedAttributes.name: b20
selectedAttributes.title: B20 Property damage
selectedAttributes.description: B20 Property damage offence count. The wilful and unlawful destruction, damage or defacement of public or private property. Includes: criminal damage, graffiti and other property damage offences.

selectedAttributes.name: b30
selectedAttributes.title: B30 Burglary/Break and enter
selectedAttributes.description: B30 Burglary/Break and enter offence count. The unlawful entry of a structure with the intent to commit an offence, where the entry is either forced or unforced. Includes: aggravated burglary and non-aggravated burglary.

selectedAttributes.name: b40
selectedAttributes.title: B40 Theft
selectedAttributes.description: B40 Theft offence count. The unlawful taking or obtaining of money or goods, not involving the use of force, threat of force or violence, coercion or deception, with the intent to permanently or temporarily deprive the owner of the use of the money or goods, or the receiving or handling of money or goods obtained unlawfully. Includes: motor vehicle theft, steal from a motor vehicle, steal from a retail store, theft of a bicycle, receiving or handling stolen goods, fare evasion and other theft.

selectedAttributes.name: b50
selectedAttributes.title: B50 Deception
selectedAttributes.description: B50 Deception offence count. Offences involving a dishonest act or omission carried out with the purpose of deceiving to obtain a benefit or avoid a disbenefit. Includes: forgery and counterfeiting, possess equipment to make false instrument, obtain benefit by deception, state false information, deceptive business practices, professional malpractice and misrepresentation, and other deception offences.

selectedAttributes.name: b60
selectedAttributes.title: B60 Bribery
selectedAttributes.description: B60 Bribery offence count. The offering, giving or accepting of a bribe involving a government official whilst exercising his or her official authority. Includes: bribery of officials.

selectedAttributes.name: b_total
selectedAttributes.title: Total offence count: (B)
selectedAttributes.description: Total offence count: (B) Property and deception.

selectedAttributes.name: c10
selectedAttributes.title: C10 Drug dealing and trafficking
selectedAttributes.description: C10 Drug dealing and trafficking offence count. Dealing and trafficking of drugs or other substances prohibited under legislation. Includes: drug dealing and drug trafficking.

selectedAttributes.name: c20
selectedAttributes.title: C20 Cultivate or manufacture drugs
selectedAttributes.description: C20 Cultivate or manufacture drugs offence count. Cultivating or manufacturing of drugs or other substances prohibited under legislation. Includes: cultivate drugs, manufacture drugs and possess drug manufacturing equipment or precursor.

selectedAttributes.name: c30
selectedAttributes.title: C30 Drug use and possession
selectedAttributes.description: C30 Drug use and possession offence count. Use and possession of drugs or other substances prohibited under legislation. Includes: drug use and drug possession.

selectedAttributes.name: c90
selectedAttributes.title: C90 Other drug offences
selectedAttributes.description: C90 Other drug offence count. Drug offences not elsewhere classified in division C. Includes: other drug offences.

selectedAttributes.name: c_total
selectedAttributes.title: Total offence count: (C)
selectedAttributes.description: Total offence count: (C) Drug offences.

selectedAttributes.name: d10
selectedAttributes.title: D10 Weapons and explosives offences
selectedAttributes.description: D10 Weapons and explosives offence count. Offences involving prohibited or regulated weapons and explosives. Includes: firearms offences, prohibited and controlled weapons offences and explosives offences.

selectedAttributes.name: d20
selectedAttributes.title: D20 Disorderly and offensive conduct
selectedAttributes.description: D20 Disorderly and offensive conduct offence count. Offences involving personal conduct that is disorderly, indicative of criminal intent or is deemed offensive to members of the public. Includes: riot and affray, drunk and disorderly in public, offensive conduct, offensive language, criminal intent and disorderly conduct.

selectedAttributes.name: d30
selectedAttributes.title: D30 Public nuisance offences
selectedAttributes.description: D30 Public nuisance offence count. Acts involving the contravention of public order and harmony. Includes: privacy offences, hoaxes, begging, defamation and libel, improper movement on public or private space and other public nuisance offences.

selectedAttributes.name: d40
selectedAttributes.title: D40 Public security offences
selectedAttributes.description: D40 Public security offence count. An act or omission that is deemed to be prejudicial to the effective carrying out of government operations specifically concerned with maintaining government security. Includes: immigration offences, sabotage, hacking, terrorism offences and other public security offences.

selectedAttributes.name: d_total
selectedAttributes.title: Total offence count: (D)
selectedAttributes.description: Total offence count: (D) Public order and security.

selectedAttributes.name: e10
selectedAttributes.title: E10 Justice procedures
selectedAttributes.description: E10 Justice procedures offence count. An act or omission that is deemed to be prejudicial to the effective carrying out of justice procedures. Includes: escape custody, fail to appear and resist or hinder officer.

selectedAttributes.name: e20
selectedAttributes.title: E20 Breaches of orders
selectedAttributes.description: E20 Breaches of orders offence count. An act or omission breaching the conditions of an order. This includes breaches of family violence orders, intervention orders, bail conditions and other orders. Includes: breach of family violence order, breach of intervention order, breach of bail conditions and breaches of other orders.

selectedAttributes.name: e_total
selectedAttributes.title: Total (E) Justice procedures offences
selectedAttributes.description: Total offence count: (E) Justice procedures.

selectedAttributes.name: f10
selectedAttributes.title: F10 Regulatory driving offences
selectedAttributes.description: F10 Regulatory driving offence count. Offences relating to vehicles and most forms of traffic, including offences pertaining to the licensing, registration, roadworthiness or use of vehicles and bicycle offences. Includes: drink driving, drug driving, speeding offences, parking offences, licensing offences, registration and roadworthiness offences and other regulatory driving offences.

selectedAttributes.name: f20
selectedAttributes.title: F20 Transport regulation offences
selectedAttributes.description: F20 Transport regulation offence count. Offences relating to breaches of transport regulations. Includes: public transport regulations, offences, aviation regulations offences, maritime regulations offences, pedestrian offences and other transport regulations offences.

selectedAttributes.name: f30
selectedAttributes.title: F30 Other government regulatory offences
selectedAttributes.description: F30 Other government regulatory offence count. Offences regulated by government not including driving or transport regulation offences. Includes: betting and gaming offences, commercial regulation offences, liquor and tobacco licensing offences, pornography and censorship offences, intellectual property offences, prostitution offences and other government regulation offences.

selectedAttributes.name: f90
selectedAttributes.title: F90 Miscellaneous offences
selectedAttributes.description: F90 Miscellaneous offence count. All other offences not elsewhere classified. Includes: environmental offences, public health and safety offences, cruelty to animals, dangerous substance offences, other and miscellaneous offences.

selectedAttributes.name: f_total
selectedAttributes.title: Total (F) Other offences
selectedAttributes.description: Total offence count: (F) Other offences.

selectedAttributes.name: grand_tot
selectedAttributes.title: Grand Total Offences
selectedAttributes.description: Grand total offences.

selectedAttributes.name: lga_erp
selectedAttributes.title: LGA Estimated Residential Population
selectedAttributes.description: Local Government Area (LGA) Estimated Resident Population (ABS). Estimated resident population, for years preceding the current year, are taken from the Australian Bureau of Statistics (ABS), Regional Population Growth, Australia (cat. no. 3218.0) - as at 30 June.

selectedAttributes.name: lga_name11
selectedAttributes.title: LGA Name
selectedAttributes.description: Local Government Area (LGA) name.

selectedAttributes.name: ref_period
selectedAttributes.title: Reference Period
selectedAttributes.description: The reference period (October 2012 - September 2016)

selectedAttributes.name: vic_erp
selectedAttributes.title: Victoria Estimated Residential Population
selectedAttributes.description: Victoria Estimated Resident Population (ABS). Estimated resident population, for years preceding the current year, are taken from the Australian Bureau of Statistics (ABS), Regional Population Growth, Australia (cat. no. 3218.0) - as at 30 June. As ABS data is not available for the current year's rates to be calculated, the CSA uses estimates created by the Victorian Government?s ?Victoria in future? report. This Victoria in future data are rounded to the nearest whole number.
